title: Post Template
description: This is a template post. Modify this and add your content. After creating the post, you have to manually add the link, date and title for your post to index.js.

title: Scikit-learn Cheatsheet
description: Scikit-learn is one of the most robust machine learning libraries around. A cheatsheet of the common scikit learn functions used.

title: Diving into Machine Learning
description: I took the plunge into the world of MOOCs with Udacity's Intro to Machine Learning. I had done undergraduate coursework on Machine Learning and that theoritical foundation helped me a lot when diving into practical implementation. Here are my notes on some of the most important concepts learnt.

title: Mining the Enron Dataset
description: The final project for Udacity's Machine Learning course involved working with the real life Enron email and financial dataset to identify the employees who were most likely to commit fraud. It forced me to think and appreciate the creativity, logic and patience needed to get accurate results.

title: Blogging with React
description: Building my blog from scratch has been my 'always-in-progress' side-project for the longest time. I started off with a messy Wordpress, progressed to the solid but unnecessarily complex Jekyll; and finally rolled out my own with vanilla JS and jQuery. Then I discovered React, a simple and powerful Javascript UI library. I worked my way through the official tutorial, applying the steps to refactor my blog. Here's how I made things work!
